steps.retrieved_evidence: I don't have any information about your specific experience or what you might have seen during a flight over the Arctic. As I'm not privy to personal experiences, I can't provide an answer. Additionally, since NASA has never admitted the existence of aliens and we only have evidence of microbial life, it's unlikely that you would have seen alien-related phenomena during your flight. If you're interested in sharing more about what you saw, I'd be happy to help interpret or provide general information on the Arctic region!
